views.markdown: MiscSettings is a free "General" tweak, with over 60 options, made for modern iOS versions! If you have a bug report or feature request, please email me in Sileo!

Status Bar:
        
            - Hide LockScreen StatusBar
            - Hide HomeScreen StatusBar
            - Disable status bar in apps
            - Hide Location
            - Hide VPN
            - Hide AirPlay
            - Hide orientation lock
            - Hide Bluetooth
            - Hide Bluetooth Accessory
            - Hide airplane
            - Hide CarPlay
            - Hide signal strength
            - Hide carrier
            - Hide WiFi
            - Hide Do Not Disturb
            - Hide Battery
            - Hide charging icon
            - Hide time
            - Hide alarm
            - Hide Breadcrumb
            - Hide Lock
            - Show status bar in folders
            - Sync Sizes
            - Custom Carrier
            - Hide %
        

    Lock Screen:
        
            - Hide today view
            - Hide "Now Playing"
            - Set notification transparency
            - Remove blur on NC
            - Hide "No Older Notifications"
            - Custom Notif + Widget corner radius
            iPhoneX only:
            - Hide unlock text
            - Hide grabber
            - Hide flashlight
            - Hide camera
            - Hide Lock
            - Hide CC Grabber
        

SpringBoard:
        
        - Hide icon labels
        - Hide page dots
        - Hide updated dots
        - Hide beta dots
        - Show app download progress
        - Pinch to close folders
        - Close folders on app launch
        - No folder animations
        - Hide folder background
        - Custom folder icon transparency
        - Remove switcher blur
        - Hide widgets page text
        - Hide today view
        - Disable SpotLight
        - Disable large titles
        - Disable paralax
        - Hide 3rd party apps in Settings
        - Hide icons in Settings
        - Touch pass through animation
        - Auto Hide Home Bar
        
     
 ControlCenter: 
        
            - Add percentage to sliders
            - Add battery percentage to LPM toggle
            - Hide Chevron
            - RealCC(disable wifi&bluetooth reconnect)
            - Customize CC tints
views.title: markdown-description
